body.p:
Henderson Ky Sept 21st/ 61
Maj W H Miller
Sir-
Inclosed please find a tender of my resignation as Captain of the Henderson Guards addressed to his Excellency Hon B. Magoffin- which you will please forward & Much oblige Yr Obdt Servt

E G Hall
Capt Henderson Guards
accepted
B. Magoffin
Comr in Chief
